generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a manhole cover, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and lined with parked cars and vegetation.
- building: Multiple buildings with distinct architectural features line both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Trees and shrubs are visible along the sidewalks and in small patches between parked cars.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: Several cars are parked along both sides of the street.
- motorcycle: A green motorcycle is parked on the right side of the street, near the sidewalk.
- traffic sign: A blue traffic sign with white symbols indicating pedestrian crossing and parking is visible on the right side of the street.
- pole: A pole supporting the traffic sign is visible on the right side of the street.
- rider: A person is riding a motorcycle on the right side of the street.
